Summary: Star like object flashing ligh in the sky
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There was one other sighting in Stockton on or around December 28th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAS I was riding to my brother house in Brentwood California, a town in between stockton and Antioch. I could not stop my eyes from looking out the window. 7 airplanes flying parallel to each other around diablo mountains. while other planes were circulating the mountain at the same time. After arriving to his house I found a dark spot to look at the sky and listen to the night sky santing to find out what kind of planes they are, and as one zoomed by I could hear a sound of somthing likesomthing resembeling bomber planes. After helping my brother the next day, driving home aproximetly at eight PM. The same scenerio appeared. This time more like 9 planes flying parallel to each other. circulating what seemed to be the Modesto or Merced area. At a point somthing resembeling a bright star showed up in the area sorrounded by those planes this object was frozen in the air. After about what it seemed like a minute the object dimmed its light of. and I could see it dimmed now litterly standing in the sky and not moving. I am possitive that it was not a plane. After reaching Sacramento, Those airplanes were flying over sacramento, and circulate certain areas. After about a hour they had vanished.
